column1: Mickey Moniak headlines today's Beat The Streak picks, bringing a strong mix of recent form and season-long steadiness at home in Colorado. With a favorable lefty-vs-righty matchup against Kyle Hendricks and a hitter-friendly park boost, Moniak’s hit rate has surged lately, making him a reliable anchor for any streak. Bobby Witt Jr. isn’t far behind, having delivered hits in nearly three-quarters of his games this year and batting second for Kansas City against a pitcher who rarely gives up hard contact, keeping Witt’s consistency front and center. Nolan Schanuel and Sal Frelick both benefit from platoon edges and solid park factors, rounding out a slate loaded with dependable options for extending your streak.
